 yes, cloud professional engineering

title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
company_industry: Software Development and IT System Custom Software Development
description:
🚀
 **Senior Fullstack GenAI Engineer – Stockholm (Hybrid)**




  





 We’re working with a market-leading SaaS scale-up building the future of content management for some of the biggest names out there (think global tech, government, and Fortune 500 📊).
 



  





 They’ve got a sleek, intuitive, cloud-native platform that’s changing how distributed teams manage complex technical documentation in real time (CMS on steroids!)
 



  





 Now, they're investing big in AI and looking for a Senior Fullstack GenAI Engineer to help lead the charge. This is your chance to join early on, shape a brand new AI team, and build cutting-edge, real-world GenAI features that actually ship.
 



  





 Role:
 



 🛠️ Be the first senior engineer in a brand new AI team, working directly with product and engineering leadership
 



 🤖 Build AI agents and workflows from the ground up using LLMs, RAG, Amazon Bedrock, and more
 



 🧱 Architect and deploy scalable AI infrastructure across a modern microservices stack
 



 🚀 Work hands-on across the entire development lifecycle: from experimentation to production
 



 👥 Not a people-management role (yet) but you'll be a technical mentor and key decision-maker
 



 🤝 Collaborate closely onsite with the Stockholm team a few days a week
 



  





 Tech Stack:
 



 🧠 GenAI: LLMs, Agentic AI, RAG, Bedrock, MCP
 



 💾 Backend: TypeScript/Node.js, Go, Python, PHP
 



 ☁️ Infra: AWS, IaC, microservices, cloud-native architecture
 



 🔌 Tools you build will interact with internal systems, external services, and customer platforms
 



  





 About you:
 



 🎯 Senior engineer with experience owning roadmaps, technical planning, and product integrations
 



 👨‍💻 Strong software dev background, ideally with recent hands-on GenAI/LLM experience
 



 🧪 You've built and deployed AI-powered features in real-world products
 



 🌱 Friendly, low-ego, collaborative energy (this is a no-politics, supportive team)
 



 🇸🇪 Stockholm-based (or willing to be onsite a few days per week)
 



  





 Key points:
 



 🧠 Work on real GenAI products, not just prototypes
 



 🏆 Join a market leader with a huge client base and ambitious growth plans
 



 🔓 High autonomy + big impact—shape the future of AI at the company
 



 🤗 Amazing culture: collaborative, people-first, and zero egos
 



 🛍️ Perks & Benefits
 



 🌴 30 days vacation
 



 💪 4,000 SEK wellness allowance
 



 🪑 2,500 SEK home office support
 



 🛡️ ITP1 pension + life/occupational insurance
 



 📍 Location: Stockholm (Hybrid – onsite a few days/week)
 



 📅 Visa Sponsorship: Not available
 



  





 Interviews are happening throughout July so please attach updated CV to find out more.

title: Traineeship at Xylem - Engineering Leadership Development Program - focus on software development, innovation, and sustainability
description:
Xylem is a Fortune 500 global water solutions company dedicated to advancing sustainable impact and empowering the people who make water work every day. As a leading water technology company with 23,000 employees operating in over 150 countries, Xylem is at the forefront of addressing the world's most critical water challenges. We invite passionate individuals to join our team, dedicated to exceeding customer expectations through innovative and sustainable solutions.
   

  

**ELDP**
 The Role: Engineering Leadership Development Program (ELDP) is an intense two year program for people who have a passion for technology, a drive for technical excellence, and share Xylem's desire to solve the world’s toughest resource challenges. The program is designed to accelerate professional development through technical and leadership training and a variety of business-critical assignments. If you love technology and want a career in engineering, the Xylem Engineering Leadership Development Program is for you!
   

  

 The Engineering Leadership Development Program is a two-year program consisting of three rotational assignments which are driven by real business priorities. The program includes Continuous Improvement training, formal presentations to senior leadership, and valuable leadership training. The Rotational assignments are intended to provide a broad exposure within Xylem (Engineering, Innovation, Sustainability, Data Science, Software Engineering, Product Management, Project Management etc.) leading to successful off program placement.
   

  

 This year´s program is with a special focus on
 **software development, innovation, and sustainability.**
**Core Responsibilities**
* Plan and perform assigned tasks within the framework of program rotation
* Complete assignment objectives on schedule, within budget, with higher than expected quality while maintaining accuracy and thoroughness
* Demonstrate ability to understand and apply engineering fundamentals in the business environment
* Demonstrate analytical / problem solving skills.
* Propose new analyses, techniques and methodologies with respect to specific area of responsibility where applicable
* Complete program training including continuous improvement training
* Participation in Xylem Watermark volunteer activities


**Qualifications**
* Recent graduate with a Bachelor’s in Engineering or Computer Science (e.g., Software, Mechanical, Electrical, Computer Engineering, etc.)
* GPA greater than or equal to 3.0/4.0 overall
* Strong commitment to a career in technology and a passion for engineering
* Strong interest in building a career in technology, software, and innovation
* Analytical approach to problem solving
* Ability to lead and work in teams
* Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
* Prior internship, co-op or research experience


 Join the global Xylem team to be a part of innovative technology solutions transforming water usage, conservation, and re-use. Our products impact public utilities, industrial sectors, residential areas, and commercial buildings, with a commitment to providing smart metering, network technologies, and advanced analytics for water, electric, and gas utilities. Partner with us in creating a world where water challenges are met with ingenuity and dedication; where we recognize the power of inclusion and belonging in driving innovation and allowing us to compete more effectively around the world.

title: Senior Data Engineer
description:
Job Description:
 



 We are looking for a seasoned Senior Data Engineer to join our Banking and Financial Services (BFS) analytics team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, building, and deploying scalable data products on a modern enterprise analytics platform leveraging Azure, Databricks, Immuta, and Unity Catalog. This role requires strong experience in SAFe Agile, ETL integration (Ab Initio/Informatica), DevOps/MLOps, and advanced pipeline development and deployment.
 



  





 The role is part of a data enablement team but specialised in Data Sourcing. The team should support the Data Product team with new data sourcing + together with the existing architects, design & deliver an updated common data acquisition approach to cater to both Data Products and existing warehouse sourcing.
 



  





 The data engineering skills needed are ETL tools (Ab Initio or Informatica), ability to understand the existing metadata driven pipeline approach, design and build solutions. This includes pipeline creation + redesign of the existing approach.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




 • Data Product Architecture & Development
 



 • Design and implement scalable data products with a clear understanding of data product lifecycle and architecture.
 



 • Build robust data pipelines using Python, Spark, and Databricks.
 



 • Ensure data products are reusable, modular, and aligned with BFS business needs.
 



 • Platform Engineering & Integration
 



 • Leverage Azure Data Services, Unity Catalog, and Immuta for secure and governed data access.
 



 • Integrate with legacy ETL tools such as Ab Initio or Informatica to support hybrid data environments.
 



 • DevOps & MLOps Enablement
 



 • Implement CI/CD pipelines for data workflows and support MLOps practices for model deployment and monitoring.
 



 • Collaborate with data scientists and ML engineers to operationalize machine learning models.
 



 • Release Management
 



 • Own release planning, versioning, and deployment of data products across multiple environments.
 



 • Ensure compliance with governance, audit, and security standards.
 



 • Agile Delivery
 



 • Work within a SAFe Agile framework, actively participating in PI planning, sprint execution, and retrospectives.
 



 • Collaborate with product owners, architects, and cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality data solutions.
 



  





**Required Skills & Experience:** 




 • 7+ years of experience in data engineering, preferably in BFS or financial services domain.
 



 • Strong expertise in Azure, Databricks, Python, Spark, and SQL.
 



 • Hands-on experience with Immuta and Unity Catalog for data governance and access control.
 



 • Proficiency in Ab Initio or Informatica ETL tools.
 



 • Solid understanding of DevOps/MLOps practices and tools (e.g., Git, Azure DevOps, MLflow).
 



 • Experience in SAFe Agile delivery environments.
 



 • Proven experience in release management and enterprise-grade deployment processes.
 



 • Strong grasp of data product architecture, including metadata, lineage, and modular design principles.
 



  





**Preferred Qualifications:** 




 • BFS domain expertise (e.g., risk, compliance, customer analytics).
 



 • Certifications in Azure Data Engineering or Databricks.
 



 • Experience with data cataloging, lineage, and metadata management.

title: Senior Data Engineer
description:
**🌱 Senior Data Engineer - AWS | Stockholm (Sweden) or Bergen (Norway)** 




  





*Build the data backbone for a smarter, more sustainable future#* 




  





 A pioneering tech company in the sustainability space is building a next-generation decision support platform powered by real-time signals and predictive modelling. They’re looking for a
 **Senior Data Engineer** 
 to lead the development of scalable, high-quality data infrastructure that powers intelligent insights across operations.
 



  





 This is a
 **senior-level role** 
 with real ownership. You’ll be shaping the architecture, tooling, and data strategy from the ground up - turning raw sensor and operational data into actionable intelligence used by customers every day.
 



  





 🧠 What You’ll Do
 


* Build and own a new data service that ingests, stores, and transforms external and internal data streams
* Design and maintain unified, time-aligned data models combining real-time signals with operational context
* Develop robust REST APIs to serve predictions and optimisation results to internal apps and external partners
* Implement automated data validation, lineage tracking, and observability at scale
* Choose the right tools for streaming vs batch workloads, balancing performance and cost
* Ensure secure, compliant data handling with access controls and audit trails
* Collaborate with product, ML, optimisation, and customer success teams to deliver measurable impact



  





 🛠 Tech Stack
 


* **Languages** 
 : Python (FastAPI, Pydantic), SQL
* **Databases** 
 : PostgreSQL, TimescaleDB or similar
* **Cloud & Storage** 
 : AWS, S3-style object storage
* **Infrastructure** 
 : Docker, GitHub Actions, CI/CD pipelines



  





 🎯 What We’re Looking For
 


* Strong Python engineering skills and experience building production-grade data pipelines
* Proven ability to design, ship, and maintain scalable data systems
* Experience with testing frameworks (pytest, fixtures), code reviews, and CI/CD
* Familiarity with time-series data, sensor fusion, or industrial data is a plus
* Exposure to ML feature engineering or optimisation/OR is a bonus
* A collaborative mindset and enthusiasm for working across teams



  





 💼 Role Details
 


* **Location** 
 : Stockholm (Remote-friendly with flexible hours)
* **Salary** 
 : Competitive
* **Benefits** 
 : Strong insurance, relocation support, and generous time off
* **Impact** 
 : Your work will directly support sustainable operations across multiple regions including Scandinavia, Canada, and Australia



  





 🚀 What Success Looks Like (First 6–12 Months)
 


* Production-grade ingest for multiple data sources with automated QA and alerting
* Unified schema supporting predictive models and optimisation workflows
* Stable, observable APIs with clear lineage and reproducibility
* Real-world validation of data signals against operational outcomes



  





 🌟 Why This Role Matters
 



 This is a rare opportunity to
 **shape a category-defining platform** 
 at the intersection of real-time sensing and predictive planning. You’ll be joining a small, high-leverage team where your decisions and code directly influence how customers operate more sustainably and efficiently.

title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
description:
🚀 Senior Fullstack GenAI Engineer – Stockholm (Hybrid)
 



  





**Be the First. Build the Future.** 




  





 Our client - a fast-growing SaaS innovator used by global enterprises - is launching a brand-new AI initiative. They’re looking for a
 **Senior Fullstack GenAI Engineer** 
 to be the founding member of this team and lead the charge in embedding cutting-edge AI into their product suite.
 



  





 🧠 What You’ll Do
 



 As the first dedicated AI engineer, you’ll play a pivotal role in shaping the future of AI within the company. This is a hands-on, high-impact role where you’ll:
 



  




* **Architect and build** 
 AI-powered features and infrastructure from the ground up.
* **Design and implement** 
 GenAI tools and agentic workflows - think chatbots, LLMs, RAG pipelines, and more.
* **Collaborate closely** 
 with product and engineering leadership to define the AI roadmap and long-term vision.
* **Prototype and productionise** 
 AI features that enhance user experience and drive product innovation.
* **Evaluate and integrate** 
 technologies like AWS Bedrock and other GenAI platforms to accelerate development.
* **Influence architectural decisions** 
 in a microservices-based environment, ensuring scalability and performance.
* **Mentor and guide** 
 future hires as the AI team grows around you.



  





 🛠️ What You Bring
 



 This isn’t a role for a pure data scientist or MLOps specialist. We’re looking for a well-rounded software engineer with a passion for AI and a track record of building real-world products. You’ll need:
 



  




* A strong background in
 **software engineering -** 
 beneficial if this is full-stack exp.
* Experience building and integrating
 **GenAI solutions** 
 into production environments.
* Proficiency in
 **Node.js/TypeScript** 
 , with additional experience in
 **Python** 
 ,
 **Go** 
 , or
 **PHP** 
 .
* Familiarity with
 **AWS** 
 (especially Bedrock);
 **GCP** 
 experience is also welcome.
* Solid understanding of
 **LLMs** 
 ,
 **RAG** 
 , and
 **agentic AI workflows** 
 .
* Experience working in
 **microservice architectures** 
 .
* A proactive, collaborative mindset and the ability to thrive in a fast-moving, startup-style environment.



  





 🌍 Why Join?
 


* **Greenfield opportunity** 
 : Be the first hire in a brand-new AI team with huge growth potential.
* **Impact** 
 : Your work will directly shape the future of the product and the company’s AI capabilities.
* **Flexibility** 
 : Hybrid working model in Stockholm - on-site a few days a week for collaboration.
* **Compensation** 
 : Competitive salary.
* **Benefits** 
 : 30 days’ holiday, wellness and home office allowances, ITP1 pension, and more.
* **Culture** 
 : A supportive, people-first environment with a flat structure and strong engineering culture.



  





 This is a rare opportunity to join a company at the start of its AI journey and make a lasting impact. If you're excited by the idea of building something from scratch and leading the way in GenAI innovation - this is your moment.
 



  





**Apply now and help our client shape the future of AI.**

title: Data Engineer
description:
**📊 Data & Analytics Engineer - Stockholm (Hybrid)** 




  





*Shape the future of data-driven decision-making in a modernising enterprise* 




  





 A well-established Swedish company is undergoing a major digital transformation and is looking for a
 **Data & Analytics Engineer** 
 to help build and optimise its new cloud-based data platform. This is a unique opportunity to join a small, high-impact team at the early stages of a long-term data modernisation journey.
 



  





 You’ll work across the full data lifecycle - from ingestion and modelling to orchestration and reporting - using modern tools like DBT, Power BI, and Azure Data Factory. The role blends elements of analytics engineering, BI development, and data pipeline optimisation, offering broad exposure and real ownership.
 



  





 🧠 What You’ll Do
 


* Own and evolve the company’s DBT-based data models, supporting business-critical reporting and analytics
* Build and maintain Power BI dashboards that deliver actionable insights to stakeholders
* Collaborate with business users to understand data needs and translate them into scalable models
* Orchestrate and monitor data pipelines using Azure Data Factory
* Optimise Snowflake usage and cost, and contribute to performance tuning
* Support legacy SQL Server-based data flows and help plan their gradual migration to the cloud
* Work closely with a small team to shape the company’s modern BI architecture



  





 🛠 Tech Stack
 


* **Core** 
 : SQL, DBT, Power BI, Snowflake
* **Cloud & Orchestration** 
 : Azure, Azure Data Factory, Blob Storage
* **Other** 
 : Python (for light scripting), Git, Medallion architecture (Bronze/Silver/Gold)



  





 🎯 What We’re Looking For
 


* Strong SQL skills and experience with data modelling and transformation
* Familiarity with DBT or a strong interest in learning it
* Experience building reports in Power BI or similar tools
* Understanding of data orchestration and pipeline monitoring (e.g., ADF, Airflow)
* Ability to work across both backend and frontend data layers
* Interest in staying up to date with new features and best practices in the data ecosystem
* Swedish language proficiency is required due to stakeholder interaction and on-call responsibilities



  





 💼 Role Details
 


* **Location** 
 : Sollentuna, Stockholm (50/50 hybrid)
* **Benefits** 
 : Competitive salary, Union agreement, pension, wellness allowance, and more
* **Team** 
 : You’ll work alongside a small but growing data team, with lots of room to shape processes and tooling



  





 🚀 Why This Role?
 


* Join a company at the start of a major cloud and data transformation
* Work with modern tools and architectures in a greenfield environment
* Take ownership of key systems and influence long-term strategy
* Be part of a stable, profitable business with a strong customer base and ambitious tech leadership

title: Data Engineer med fokus på DevOps
description:
För vår kund
 **Finansinspektionen i Stockholm** 
 söker vi en erfaren
 **Data Engineer** 
 med fokus på DevOps för att sätta upp en ny analysplattform med komponenter och pipelines.
   

  

 Finansinspektionen står inför ett strategiskt initiativ att införa en ny analysplattform som ska stödja verksamhetens ökade behov av datadrivna beslut. Plattformen ska möjliggöra modern dataanalys, visualisering och rapportering, samt integreras med befintliga datakällor och system.
   

  

 Finansinspektionen söker därför efter en data engineer med stark DevOps-profil som har erfarenhet av att utveckla hybrida analysplattformar baserade på open source-verktyg i containerbaserade miljöer.
   

  

**Skall-krav**
* Designa, bygga och underhålla containerbaserade lösningar för datahantering och analys.
* Automatisera och optimera pipelines för dataflöden modellkörningar och plattformsdrift.
* Integrera och konfigurera open source-verktyg inom dataanalys, exempelvis Apache Airflow, dbt, JupyterHub eller liknande
* Säkerställa robusthet, skalbarhet och säkerhet i plattformens infrastruktur.
* Stötta teamet med DevOps-principer och kunskapsöverföring.
* Erfarenhet från finansiell sektor och/eller myndighet
* Förstå svenska i tal och i skrift


**Mervärdeskrav:**
* Bör ha erfarenhet av uppdrag med It inom finansiell sektor och/eller myndighet
* Bör ha arbetat med Docker och Kubernetes i on prem -miljöer
* Bör ha erfarenhet av att konfigurera orkestrering i mha Airflow, Dagster eller liknande verktyg
* Bör ha erfarenhet av att sätt upp automatiserade tester
* Bör ha erfarenhet av att jobba agilt enligt SAFE-ramverket

title: Spännande möjligheter för Mjukvaruingenjörer hos Saab!
company_industry: Defense and Space Manufacturing, Security and Investigations, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
*Drivs du av att se dina idéer bli verklighet? Välkommen till vår spännande och teknikintensiva värld.*
**Din roll**
 I ett nära samarbete med engagerade kollegor kommer du att ställas inför varierande och utmanande uppgifter och din roll kommer att omfatta hela produktcykeln – från design, kodning till testning och implementering.
   

  

 Vår arbetskultur på Saab präglas av ett seriöst, långsiktigt och förtroendebaserat tillvägagångssätt. Vi värdesätter att ha roligt tillsammans och tror på att bygga starka och hållbara relationer. Oavsett om du är i början av din karriär eller om du är en erfaren specialist inom ditt område, är det viktigaste att du delar vår passion för utveckling och ny teknologi.
   

  

**Din profil**
 Har du kunskap inom någon av dessa områden; C++, Java, Python och Linux? Vi är intresserade av att lära känna just dig! Vad driver dig och vad vill du utvecklas inom? På vårt kontor i Järfälla erbjuder vi en bred variation av spännande möjligheter inom mjukvaruutveckling. Vi söker personer för roller som –
 ***mjukvaruutvecklare, mjukvaruingenjörer, devops-ingenjörer, testingenjörer och Scrum masters.***
 Vi värdesätter egenskaper som nyfikenhet, starkt driv och förmågan att effektivt kommunicera och samarbeta. Vi ser att du har en relevant högskole – eller civilingenjörsexamen, tillsammans med flytande kunskaper i svenska och engelska.
   

  

 Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.
   

  

**Vad du blir en del av**
 Bakom våra innovationer finns alla de som har gjort det möjligt. Modiga pionjärer och kluriga tänkare. Vardagshjältar och kreativa problemlösare. De som delar djup kunskap och de som utforskar nya områden. Och alla däremellan.
   

  

 Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 22 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här
   

  

*Ta chansen att bli en del av vårt härliga team och gör ditt intresse för teknik till verklighet hos Saab!*

title: Data Engineer
description:
Are you our new Data Engineer?
   

  

**Subscription Data Enablement** 
 is a team in Schibsted Media, part of the Subscription business unit. We’re on a mission to build robust and scalable data capabilities that enable commercial growth through personalisation, automation, and insight. Our team consists of Analysts, Data Scientists, and Data Engineers working together to make data actionable across the subscription customer lifecycle.
   

  

 As a Data Engineer, you’ll play a central role in designing and maintaining the technical foundation that powers our analytics, predictive models, and personalisation engines. If you’re passionate about building clean, modern, and reliable data pipelines, and want to help shape how data is used to drive subscription growth across some of the strongest media brands in the Nordics — we’d love to hear from you!
   

  

  

  

**Your responsibilities:**
* Develop and maintain scalable, reliable, and secure data pipelines that power analytics, AI/ML models, and personalisation capabilities
* Design efficient ETL/ELT workflows to support both batch and near-real-time data processing
* Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, product managers, and developers to ensure our data infrastructure supports business needs
* Contribute to the evolution of our data architecture, including best practices for data modelling, testing, monitoring, and quality control
* Help shape the development of domain-based data products, enabling reusability and transparency across the organisation
* Continuously work to improve performance, efficiency, and observability in the data ecosystem


**What’s in it for you?**
 In return, Subscription can offer you:
   

  

* A hybrid, informal, and highly collaborative working environment
* The opportunity to work in one of the largest and most experienced data communities in the Nordics
* A chance to directly impact how millions of users experience our brands through smarter, data-driven products
* Competitive salary and benefits
* Career development opportunities within the broader Schibsted Group


 ,
   

  

  

  

**Who are we looking for?**
 We’re looking for a
 **modern, pragmatic, and collaborative data engineer** 
 who enjoys working with data as a product and building the underlying infrastructure that empowers others.
   

  

**You likely bring:**
* A relevant degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent experience
* 2+ years experience in data engineering, or in a similar role
* Proficiency in SQL and Python (or equivalent scripting language)
* Experience with modern data stack tools (e.g. Snowflake, dbt, Airflow, git)
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (preferably AWS) and containerisation (e.g. Docker, Kubernetes)
* Understanding of data warehouse/lakehouse architecture, ELT principles, and CI/CD pipelines
* Bonus if you have experience or interest in data mesh principles or domain-driven design


 You don’t need to tick every box — we value curiosity, collaboration, and a willingness to learn.
   

  

  

  

* Apply now!


 Please send us your application and CV. We interview candidates continuously.
   

  

**Work location:** 
 Oslo or Stockholm (hybrid)
   

  

**Application deadline:** 
 8.september, 2025
   

  

**Contact:** 
 Navdeep Singh – Head of Data Enablement
   

  

 📧 navdeep.m.singh@schibsted.no
   

  

 📞 +47 97979209

Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här
   

  

*Ta chansen att bli en del av vårt härliga team och gör ditt intresse för teknik till verklighet hos Saab!*

title: ERP Project Manager
description:
**About Us:** 




  





 Wipro Limited (NYSE: WIT, BSE: 507685, NSE: WIPRO) is a leading technology services and consulting company focused on building innovative solutions that address clients’ most complex digital transformation needs. Leveraging our holistic portfolio of capabilities in consulting, design, engineering, and operations, we help clients realize their boldest ambitions and build future-ready, sustainable businesses. With over 230,000 employees and business partners across 65 countries, we deliver on the promise of helping our clients, colleagues, and communities thrive in an ever-changing world.
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




  





 Wipro is seeking a
 **D365FO/CE Implementation Project Manager** 
 to lead end-to-end implementations of Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations (D365FO) & Microsoft Dynamics CE. The ideal candidate will have strong project management experience, deep knowledge of D365FO and CE, and expertise in managing large-scale ERP implementations across industries. This role requires coordination between clients, internal teams, and stakeholders to ensure successful project delivery.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




  




* Lead end-to-end D365FO or CE implementation projects, ensuring on-time and within-budget delivery.
* Develop and execute project plans, timelines, budgets, and risk mitigation strategies.
* Collaborate with business leaders, technical teams, and end-users to define project goals and requirements.
* Drive requirement gathering, gap analysis, and solution design workshops.
* Manage and oversee system configuration, customization, and integration with third-party applications.
* Ensure project governance by following Microsoft's Sure Step/Agile/Waterfall methodologies.
* Provide regular status reports to stakeholders and executive sponsors.
* Conduct UAT (User Acceptance Testing), training, and post-go-live support.
* Lead and mentor teams to ensure adherence to best practices and compliance standards.
* Ensure projects align with D365FO release updates, compliance, and security standards.



  





**Required Skills & Qualifications:** 




  




* 10+ years of experience in ERP implementations, with 5+ years in D365FO or in CE.
* Proven experience in managing full-cycle D365FO or CE implementations across Finance, Supply Chain, Manufacturing, or Retail.
* Strong knowledge of Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations modules.
* Expertise in project management methodologies (Agile, Scrum, Waterfall, Sure Step).
* Project management certifications like PMP, PRINCE2, Agile Certified Project Manager are preferred
* Ability to manage stakeholders, budgets, and timelines effectively.
* Experience in managing Azure DevOps and understanding LCS (Lifecycle Services), and Power Platform integrations.
* Excellent communication, leadership, and problem-solving skills.



  





**Why Join Wipro?** 




  




* Work on global enterprise projects with cutting-edge technologies.
* Opportunity for career growth and learning in Microsoft Dynamics.
* Be part of a diverse and inclusive work culture.
* Competitive compensation and benefits package.



  





  





**Diversity and Inclusion at Wipro** 




  





*We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, marital status, age, ethnic and national origin, sexual and political orientation and disability status, or any other characteristic protected by law.* 




  





 Reinvent your world. We are building a modern Wipro. We are an end-to-end digital transformation partner with the boldest ambitions. To realize them, we need people inspired by reinvention. Of yourself, your career, and your skills. We want to see the constant evolution of our business and our industry. It has always been in our DNA - as the world around us changes, so do we. Join a business powered by purpose and a place that empowers you to design your own reinvention. Come to Wipro. Realize your ambitions. Applications from people with disabilities are explicitly welcome.

title: Integratör
company_industry: Defense and Space Manufacturing, Security and Investigations, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
*Vi tror att framsteg och möjligheter skapas bäst tillsammans. Välkommen till en plats där samarbete gör skillnad.*
 Din roll
   

  

 Nu söker vi fler integratörer som vill arbeta med ledningssystem både till det svenska flygvapnet och till kunder utomlands. Den här tjänsten erbjuder ett stimulerande och varierande arbete i projektens samtliga faser, men med extra tyngdpunkt på tidiga faser, t.ex. vid integration av olika systemkomponenter och vid förändring av kommunikations- och säkerhetslösningar. Arbetet innebär bland annat medverkan vid systemutformning, utveckling, integration, konfiguration, driftsättning, utprovning och support. Du kommer utforma integrations- och säkerhetslösningar men även vara behjälplig med att genomföra analyser och utredningar. I din roll kommer du att arbeta nära kunden, dess leverantörer samt användarna. Systemen vi levererar är främst Linuxbaserade och är i drift dygnet runt, året runt för att säkerställa våra kunders operativa förmåga.
   

  

 Du förväntas till störst del arbeta on site från vårt kontor, med viss möjlighet till remote jobb beroende på projekt och undantagsfall. I dagsläget är kontoret beläget i Järfälla där vi planerar en flytt till Solna strand på sikt. Arbetet kan även innebära resor, mestadels inom Sverige.
   

  

 Din profil
   

  

 Vi ser gärna att du har en högskoleutbildning med inriktning på datateknik och nätverk eller motsvarande utbildning som bedöms likvärdig. Vi tror att rätt kandidat för tjänsten har minst 5 års erfarenhet av liknande arbetsuppgifter och ett djupt intresse för teknik. Vidare erfarenhet från följande punkter är meriterande:
   

  

* Linux
* Virtualisering
* Automatiserade installationsprocesser
* Installation
* Felsökning
* Driftsättning
* Nätverkshantering
* Grundläggande IT-säkerhet, logghantering, härdning, brandväggar
* Versionshantering
* Public Key Infrastructure
* Python
* Bash


 Eftersom arbetet är självständigt och i nära samarbete med kunden är det viktigt att du är drivande, utåtriktad och villig att ta ansvar. Du har en positiv grundsyn, har god samarbetsförmåga och har lätt för att kommunicera. Eftersom vi jobbar i en internationell miljö är det viktigt att du, utöver svenska, även behärskar engelska i tal och skrift.
   

  

*Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.*
 Vad du blir en del av
   

  

 Bakom våra innovationer finns alla de som har gjort det möjligt. Modiga pionjärer och kluriga tänkare. Vardagshjältar och kreativa problemlösare. De som delar djup kunskap och de som utforskar nya områden. Och alla däremellan.
   

  

 Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 25,500 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här.
   

  

 Vill du lära känna vår verksamhet och personal lite bättre? Här kan du hitta berättelser från några av våra anställda.

title: Dataingenjör/Programmerare
description:
Vi söker en programmerare med goda kunskaper i Python och SAS för att utveckla lösningar enligt interna specifikationer och riktlinjer. Uppdraget omfattar sedvanliga arbetsuppgifter inom mjukvaruutveckling såsom:

title: Experienced AI Researcher
description:
**Join our Team**
**About this opportunity:**
 Ericsson Research is the central research organization within Ericsson. Our mission is to provide Ericsson with system concepts, technology and methodology and to secure long-term competitive product positioning.
   

  

 The position is for an Experienced AI researcher in the Cognitive Automation Lab located in Stockholm, Sweden. We are an international research team doing research on a range of disciplines, spanning Radio communications, Network architectures, AI, Cloud, Devices and Security.
   

  

 Are you a curious person who actively follows new AI technologies and seeks the opportunity to work in an innovative organization? Maybe this job as an AI researcher in the Cognitive Automation Lab at Ericsson Research, Kista, Sweden is for you!
   

  

**What you will do:**
 Our team likes to move fast and explore new research directions in AI. A day as an AI researcher in our Cognitive Automation Lab can be very diverse and may include one or more of the following activities:
   

  

* Define a challenging AI research problem
* Solve a research problem by developing new and leveraging cutting edge algorithms and technology approaches of AI
* Test out disruptive or academic technologies in an industrial setting
* Prototype development
* Disseminate your results at top ranked research venues
* Demo your results to other teams, Ericsson business units and global customers
* Technical workshops for creation of new concepts and ideas, for later implementation
* Collaboration with academic researchers and other industrial researchers
* Creation of an innovation disclosure
* Research discussion within the team and with other researchers outside of Sweden
* Coding session with the team
* Define a master thesis topic
* Support a master thesis student who wants to learn more about machine reasoning
* A common lunch with the other Cognitive Automation Lab team members


**The skills you bring:**
* Strong interest and background in one or more of the following areas is required:
* Agentic AI, generative AI, foundation models
* Multi-agent systems and reinforcement learning
* Neural-symbolic AI
* Understanding of symbolic artificial intelligence, logical reasoning
* Knowledge graphs, knowledge extraction and knowledge representation
* Automated (AI) planning
* Causal AI
* Model-based AI systems, Modeling and analysis of system behavior
* Demonstrated implementation/programming skills and experience with open source software stacks
* Ability to think unconventionally to derive creative and innovative solutions.
* Fresh PhD degree from a top university (preferred) or master thesis degree and few years of working experience with a thesis in one of the areas above and first author publications in strong venues


**Appreciated Qualifications:**
* Strong telecom domain expertise
* Demonstrated ability to develop original research agendas
* Demonstrated ability to develop novel and innovative ideas, generate patents
* Published results at leading AI conferences and in journals (such as ICML, NeurIPS, AAAI, IJCAI and ICLR)
* Prior experience in a AI research organization/academia


**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 771468

title: Fullstack C#/.NET Career Program, Höst 2025, Stockholm
description:
**Vill du satsa på en framtid som Fullstackutvecklare?** 




  





  





 Oavsett om du är självlärd eller har programmerat tidigare, erbjuder
 **SALT – School of Applied Technology** 
 en intensiv, praktisk och kostnadsfri 13-veckorsutbildning i C#/.NET, frontend och molnteknik. Här får du inte bara teknisk kompetens – du utvecklar också de färdigheter som krävs för att lyckas som konsult i en bransch i ständig utveckling.
 



  





**Plat** 
 s: Kungsholmen, Stockholm
 



**Star** 
 t: 1 oktober 2025
 



**Efter utbildningen:** 
 Vi matchar dig med uppdrag hos ledande företag, med möjlighet till anställning hos kund.
 



  





  





**Vad får du lära dig?** 




 Utbildningen ger dig praktisk erfarenhet av att utveckla moderna, skalbara applikationer i C# och .NET. Du arbetar i team med verklighetsnära projekt och utvecklar både teknisk och konsultmässig kompetens.
 



  





 Utbildningen är uppdelad i flera moduler där du steg för steg lär dig de centrala delarna av modern systemutveckling enligt nedan:
 



  




* Programmering i C# med fokus på objektorientering, asynkron programmering och avancerade koncept som designmönster, SOLID-principer och beroendehantering
* Webbutveckling med ASP.NET Core, inklusive MVC-arkitektur, API-utveckling, testning och dokumentationModerna frontend-ramverk som React och JavaScript (inkl. TypeScript) för att bygga responsiva och användarvänliga gränssnitt
* Databaser och datahantering, inklusive SQL, Entity Framework, Dapper och migreringar
* CI/CD och autentisering med verktyg som GitHub Actions, JWT, OAuth och säkerhetsprinciper
* Molnutveckling i Azure, såsom webbappar, lagringslösningar och cloud-arkitektur
* Fullständig projektcykel – från planering, utveckling i team och agilt arbetssätt till slutlig presentation och molnbaserad driftsättning
* Agilt samarbete i team och kodkvalitet i fokus
* Intervjuträning, konsultmässighet och verkliga projekt



  





  





**Viktigt! Innan utbildningen startar krävs att du genomför en obligatorisk precourse** 
 online, där du får individuell återkoppling från våra instruktörer. Det ger dig en trygg och stark start i programmet.
 



  





**Är du den vi söker?** 




 Vi söker dig som har
 **god samarbetsförmåga, är kommunikativ och flexibel.** 
 För att lyckas i uppdraget ser vi även att du har ett
 **starkt självledarskap** 
**och ett lösningsorienterat** 
 arbetssätt – du tar ansvar, är proaktiv och ser möjligheter snarare än hinder.
 



  





 En framgångsrik konsult besitter både teknisk kompetens och välutvecklade mjuka färdigheter, kombinerat med ett professionellt och engagerat förhållningssätt.
 



  





  





**Du behöver även:** 



* Ha kodat regelbundet det sen
* aste åretBehärska svenska och engelska i tal oc
* h skrift.Ha giltigt arbetstillstånd i m
* inst 2 årVara bosatt i eller nära
* StockholmHa avslutad eftergymnasial utbildning och arbetslivserfarenhet.



  





**Meriterande:** 



* Kunskap i objektorienterad programmering (OOP)
* Erfarenhet av git och GitHub
* Tidigare IT- eller systemutvecklingserfarenhet
* Kandidatexamen eller Master.



  





  





**Övrig information:** 



* Programmet är kostnadsfritt men obetalt – första
 **lön utgår** 
 retroaktivt efter påbörjad anställning. Du behöver därför kunna försörja dig under utbildningsperioden.
* **Ansök senast: 29e augusti – urval sker löpande!**



  





  





*Frågor? Kolls in vår FAQ på vår hemsida eller kontakta* 
 oss direkt!

title: Technical Solutions Engineer
description:
Gothenburg, Västra Götaland County


Job ID JR2025467640 Category Information Technology Role Type Hybrid Post Date Aug. 18, 2025  

**Job Description**


At Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place. We’re committed to fostering an environment for every teammate that’s welcoming, respectful and inclusive, with great opportunity for professional growth. Find your future with us.

**Jeppesen, a subsidiary of The Boeing Company,** is one of the largest software development companies in Gothenburg. We develop and implement innovative resource management and optimization solutions for the world’s leading airlines. We are dedicated to continuous improvement and delivering more value to our clients.

 **At Jeppesen’s office in central Gothenburg** you will work in a one-of-a-kind software development organization with solutions that make a real difference to people around the world. You will be working in an agile learning organization, surrounded by a team of talented, creative and dedicated colleagues. You will learn and broaden your perspective by working with 400 professionals from more than 50 different nations, but also be part of a global organization allowing for collaboration with customers and colleagues across the world. Most importantly, you will be expected to make a difference.


We are seeking a highly motivated and versatile Technical Solutions Engineer to join our team.


The ideal candidate will be responsible for technical maintenance and oversight of training courses and related deployment and infrastructure. This will include course alignment, modernization and migration, along with roadmap development in collaboration with the Solution Offer Manager to ensure solution capabilities align with market demands. This role requires a candidate with a strong technical background combined with a strategic mindset and the ability to execute plans effectively to deliver the necessary capabilities within established timelines.

  

The candidate will be responsible for planning and supporting the course platform used for course training and delivery of our Crew Academy training offerings.

**Position Responsibilities:**

* Transition Management: Plan and execute on the transition of existing courses from on-premises hosting to cloud-based solutions, including Software as a Service (SaaS) platforms
* Support and Implementation: Support course instructors in course migration and modernization, along with error correction
* Execution and Delivery: Ensure the execution of the roadmap, delivering on required capabilities and timelines while managing any associated risks
* Course Updates Coordination: Coordination of course updates in response to new major versions of underlying products, ensuring that all content remains current and relevant
* Technical Information Provision: Provide detailed technical information regarding course capabilities, capacity, and licensing of vendor software to Academy Crew management, and redirect inquiries to the appropriate technical personnel when necessary
* Roadmap Development: Collaborate with the Solution Offer Manager to create and maintain a roadmap that outlines the necessary technical capabilities to meet offer demands
* Multi-Team Collaboration: Work effectively in a multi-team environment, fostering collaboration and communication among various stakeholders to align on project goals
* Risk Assessment: Utilize technical expertise to identify potential risks and align estimates accordingly, ensuring that all projects are delivered on time and within scope
* Process Development: Develop and implement processes to enhance the robustness and stability of the solution, ensuring a high-quality learning experience for all users
* End-to-End Capability Management: Take ownership of the end-to-end capabilities of the Academy courses platform, ensuring that all technical aspects are functioning optimally


Basic Qualifications **(Required** Skills/Experience):

* Hands-on experience in Linux server deployment, cloud-server products maintenance, advanced skills in bash scripting, good notion of networking
* Strong understanding of cloud technologies, SaaS solutions and server configuration
* Proven experience in a technical role, preferably within an educational or training environment
* Strong project management skills with ability to deliver projects on time and within budget
* Fluent in spoken and written English


This position is **hybrid**. This means that the selected candidate will be required to perform some work onsite 3 days a week. This is at the hiring team’s discretion and could potentially change in the future.

**Preferred Qualifications (Desired Skills/Experience):**

* Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field (e.g., Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology) or equivalent experience
* Ability to work collaboratively in a multi-team environment and communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to assess risks and develop mitigation strategies

**Please apply by sending your CV in English.**

**Employer will sponsor applicants for employment visa status.**

**R****elocation:** This position offer relocation.  



  

**Join us if you want to:**

* Have the opportunity to work with the most well-known companies in the aviation world
* Learn new things every day
* Work together with highly motivated and skilled team mates
* Work with new technologies and cloud deployments
* Have Private Medical Insurance (Skandia)
* Enjoy additional days off for Christmas break (December 24th-January 1st)
* Participate in employee recognition program (Boeing PridePoints)
* Pension Plan (Defined Contribution Plan)

**Typical Educ/Exper**


Education/experience typically acquired through advanced technical education (e.g. Bachelor) and typically 9 or more years' related work experience or an equivalent combination of technical education and experience (e.g. PhD+4 years' related work experience, Master+7 years' related work experience, 13 years' related work experience, etc.).

  

Applications for this position will be accepted until **Sept. 07, 2025**

 **Export Control Requirements:** This is not an Export Control position. **Relocation**

This position offers relocation based on candidate eligibility.

**Visa Sponsorship**

Employer willing to sponsor applicants for employment visa status.

**Shift**

Not a Shift Worker (Sweden)

 **Equal Opportunity Employer:**


We are an equal opportunity employer. We do not accept unlawful discrimination in our recruitment or employment practices on any grounds including but not limited to; race, color, ethnicity, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, physical or mental disability, genetic factors, military and veteran status, or other characteristics covered by applicable law.


We have teams in more than 65 countries, and each person plays a role in helping us become one of the world’s most innovative, diverse and inclusive companies. We are proud members of the Valuable 500 and welcome applications from candidates with disabilities. Applicants are encouraged to share with our recruitment team any accommodations required during the recruitment process. Accommodations may include but are not limited to: conducting interviews in accessible locations that accommodate mobility needs, encouraging candidates to bring and use any existing assistive technology such as screen readers and offering flexible interview formats such as virtual or phone interviews.


  
**Your Benefits**
-----------------


No matter where you are in life, our benefits help prepare you for the present and the future.


* Competitive base pay and incentive programs.
* Industry-leading tuition assistance program pays your institution directly.
* Resources and opportunities to grow your career.
* Up to $10,000 match when you support your favorite nonprofit organizations.

title: Information Security Officer
description:
At Söderberg & Partners, innovation, trust, and security are core to everything we do. As our organization continues to grow, we are looking for a skilled and experienced Information Security Officer (ISO) to help protect our clients’ data, uphold regulatory compliance, and strengthen our cyber resilience.
  
  

As an Information Security Officer, you will be part of the Information Security team, based in Stockholm and will report to the Chief Information Security Officer. You’ll play a key role in advising and supporting companies under the Söderberg & Partners brand - across insurance, wealth management, and fintech - with hands-on security leadership, ICT-risk management, and compliance efforts.
  
  

You will also act as an internal consultant, providing information security expertise and services to affiliated companies within the group.
  
  

**Location:** Stockholm (Hybrid), with regular travel to Oslo and Copenhagen
  
  

What You’ll Do
  
  

* Serve as Information Security Officer for selected companies under the Söderberg & Partners brand (primarily in Sweden, Norway, and Denmark)
* Work with assignments and projects within our information security team, like risk assessments, and internal/external audits Develop and manage security policies, awareness programs, and third-party risk processes
* Support security incident response and assessments of supplier and customer security
* Secure compliance with regulations such as DORA, EBA guidelines and other regulations
* Educate stakeholders, including key roles, end users and management
* Collaborate with business, IT, and compliance teams to embed a pragmatic, business-aligned approach to security


What You Bring
  
  

* Proven experience as an Information Security Officer or in a senior information security role as an employee or consultant
* Strong knowledge of information security frameworks (e.g. ISO/IEC 27001/2), risk management, and European financial regulations
* Strong documentation skills (security policies etc.)
* Knowledge of technologies and processes within IT and cybersecurity - IT-operations, cloud security (Microsoft Azure), and secure development practices
* Fluent in Swedish and English (Norwegian, Danish, or Dutch is a plus)
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills


A bonus is if you also have certifications in information security (e.g. CISSP, CISM, ISO Lead Implementer) and/or experience working with IT frameworks like ITIL, COBIT
  
  

What We Offer
  
  

* A central role in a growing security team at one of Sweden’s top financial advisory firms
* Exciting, varied tasks and initiatives across the Nordics
* A modern HQ in central Stockholm
* A culture that values initiative, analyses, innovation, and collaboration
* Continuous learning and development in a purpose-driven company focused on scalability and growth


We recruit continuously—submit your application today and be part of our journey!
  
  

**Start Date:** As soon as possible, by agreement
  
  

Söderberg & Partners is a leading non-bank provider of wealth management, corporate pension and insurance services in the Nordic region and the Netherlands. The company offers a wide range of financial services to a substantial and diversified client base that includes corporations, government institutions and individuals. Founded in 2004, the firm is headquartered in Stockholm and maintains offices across Europe. The firm ownership is divided between Mr. P-O Söderberg, the founders and management together with two of the world’s largest financial investors – KKR and TA Associates.

title: Data Scientist - Sweden Operations
description:
**Shape the Future of Data Science in Life-Saving Medicine Production at AstraZeneca!**


Are you passionate about leveraging AI, machine learning, and advanced analytics to drive innovation and impact in healthcare? At AstraZeneca, we put patients first and strive to meet their unmet needs worldwide. Working here means being ambitious, thinking big, and working together to make the impossible a reality. Join us as we harness the power of science and technology to truly change the course of medicine and bring bold new ideas to life.


As a Data Scientist within Sweden Operations in Södertälje, you will play a pivotal role in transforming our operations through cutting-edge analytics and advanced data science solutions. You will join a highly collaborative and cross-disciplinary environment, working alongside expert teams across the company to fuel fact-based decision-making and empower process optimization throughout our value chain.

**What You'll Do**


The Data, Analytics & AI team is integral to the Strategy & Performance function in Sweden Operations. You will work side by side with other data scientists, analysts, and technology experts, delivering insights and developing innovative data-driven solutions that optimize business processes and support strategic projects. Our analytics initiatives span Inbound, Manufacturing, Quality, Outbound, and critical support functions such as Maintenance, Supply, and Production Planning.

* In this role, you will: Coordinate the implementation of innovative modelling solutions, integrating complex data from multiple sources and modalities to generate actionable insights.
* Translate unstructured business challenges into analytically tractable problems, applying state-of-the-art machine learning and statistical models.
* Develop and deploy predictive models and computational methods that guide decision-making and operational improvements.
* Act as a subject-matter expert by providing training and advisory services, and ensuring best practices in data science and analytics across Sweden Operations.
* Communicate data-driven insights clearly and objectively, influencing partners and shaping impactful solutions.
* Maintain robust, production-grade data science workflows, ensuring compliance, quality, and sustained business value.
* Leverage generative AI, large language models, and advanced ML to automate processes, enhance data insights, and solve complex business problems.

**What We're Looking For**

* Master’s degree (or equivalent experience) in operations research, mathematics, computer science, engineering, or a related quantitative field
* Proven experience with Python and advanced machine learning methods, including supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, generative AI such as large language models, and computer vision models
* Demonstrated proficiency across the full data science workflow
* Strong skills in manipulating and analyzing high-dimensional datasets, drawing actionable conclusions, and communicating technical results or requirements to business stakeholders in business-friendly language
* Hands-on experience with SQL databases
* Excellent collaboration and communication skills, with the ability to engage effectively with multidisciplinary teams and stakeholders
* Fluency in English, both spoken and written

**Desirable Experience**

* Experience with AWS cloud platform & Snowflake
* Familiarity with software development tools, including Git, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, and agile methodologies
* Experience working in multinational or digitally mature organizations
* Proficiency in Power BI, Dash, Tableau
* Swedish language skills

**Why AstraZeneca?**


At AstraZeneca, you’ll have the opportunity to truly make an impact, contributing to the production of life-saving medicines while developing your career in a forward-thinking, global organization. We offer an extraordinary international working environment with excellent opportunities for collaboration, innovation, and professional growth. Diversity and inclusion are at our core, ensuring everyone can thrive.

**What’s Next?**


Are you ready to help lead the digital transformation of medicine production? Apply now, submit your CV and cover letter no later than **August 27th 2025.**

By the way: If you have publicly available repositories or a portfolio showcasing data science or analytics projects (deep learning, ensemble methods, AI, optimization, etc.), include a link with your application.

*Join us, and together we’ll turn big data into bold ideas that change patients’ lives.*
company_description: Build unrivalled capabilities in a place that promotes learning agility and offers development opportunities. We never standstill so you’ll have the chance to constantly grow your abilities.

title: Experienced AI Researcher
description:
Stockholm,Stockholm,Sweden
Job ID**771468**
Join our Team
**About this opportunity:**


Ericsson Research is the central research organization within Ericsson. Our mission is to provide Ericsson with system concepts, technology and methodology and to secure long-term competitive product positioning.

  

The position is for an Experienced AI researcher in the Cognitive Automation Lab located in Stockholm, Sweden. We are an international research team doing research on a range of disciplines, spanning Radio communications, Network architectures, AI, Cloud, Devices and Security.

  

Are you a curious person who actively follows new AI technologies and seeks the opportunity to work in an innovative organization? Maybe this job as an AI researcher in the Cognitive Automation Lab at Ericsson Research, Kista, Sweden is for you!

 **What you will do:**


Our team likes to move fast and explore new research directions in AI. A day as an AI researcher in our Cognitive Automation Lab can be very diverse and may include one or more of the following activities:

  

* Define a challenging AI research problem
* Solve a research problem by developing new and leveraging cutting edge algorithms and technology approaches of AI
* Test out disruptive or academic technologies in an industrial setting
* Prototype development
* Disseminate your results at top ranked research venues
* Demo your results to other teams, Ericsson business units and global customers
* Technical workshops for creation of new concepts and ideas, for later implementation
* Collaboration with academic researchers and other industrial researchers
* Creation of an innovation disclosure
* Research discussion within the team and with other researchers outside of Sweden
* Coding session with the team
* Define a master thesis topic

Support a master thesis student who wants to * about machine reasoning
* A common lunch with the other Cognitive Automation Lab team members

 **The skills you bring:**

* Strong interest and background in one or more of the following areas is required:


o Agentic AI, generative AI, foundation models


o Multi-agent systems and reinforcement learning


o Neural-symbolic AI


o Understanding of symbolic artificial intelligence, logical reasoning


o Knowledge graphs, knowledge extraction and knowledge representation


o Automated (AI) planning


o Causal AI


o Model-based AI systems, Modeling and analysis of system behavior

* Demonstrated implementation/programming skills and experience with open source software stacks
* Ability to think unconventionally to derive creative and innovative solutions.
* Fresh PhD degree from a top university (preferred) or master thesis degree and few years of working experience with a thesis in one of the areas above and first author publications in strong venues

 **Appreciated Qualifications:**

* Strong telecom domain expertise
* Demonstrated ability to develop original research agendas
* Demonstrated ability to develop novel and innovative ideas, generate patents
* Published results at leading AI conferences and in journals (such as ICML, NeurIPS, AAAI, IJCAI and ICLR)
* Prior experience in a AI research organization/academia
**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**

title: Receptionist Scandic Star Sollentuna
description:
\*\*Scandic Star Sollentuna\*\* ligger enbart ett par steg ifrån Sollentunas pendeltågsstation och 17 minuter till city. Vi har möjlighet att låta 500 gäster äta, konferera och sova under samma tak, vilket gör hotellet till den perfekta platsen för stora möten och kongresser. Hos oss arbetar du i en flexibel miljö där du möter många olika gäster, allt från business till barnfamiljer. Här erbjuder vi dig en spännande och fartfylld arbetsplats med härliga kollegor! Älskar du möten lika mycket som oss? Då är du den vi söker!


**Nu söker vi en Receptionist till Scandic Star Sollentuna.**



Oavsett varför gästen kommer till oss är det få saker som är så uppskattade som ett vänligt ansikte som hälsar välkommen. Du agerar värd tillsammans med övriga teamet på hotellet och skapar en gästupplevelse i världsklass.



Hos oss får du ta ett stort eget ansvar för att ta de beslut som krävs för att göra gästen nöjd och teamen utvecklar och förbättrar arbetssätt och service i takt med att omvärlden förändras. Vi är nämligen övertygade om att det är när du får utvecklas och bidra med all din kompetens och erfarenhet som vi överträffar gästens förväntningar. På köpet får vi kul på jobbet!



Så ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss – och bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic!


**Vad är innebär rollen?**



Du som arbetar i receptionen är ansvarig för att våra gäster får service i världsklass. Du är spindeln i nätet som ser till att gästen alltid är i fokus. Du är den som går igenom ankomstlistan och lägger tid på detaljerna. Ser till att gästens önskemål uppfylls. Du har alltid ett leende på läpparna och en kreativ lösning i bakfickan. Du löser det mesta och är en stjärna på att vända en missnöjd gäst till en nöjd gäst. Din arbetsplats är vår lobby. För det är där du möter flest gäster. I ansvarsområdet ingår även administrativt arbete, säkerhetsarbete och arbete med försäljning.


Arbetet i receptionen innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Du hanterar bokningar i systemet Opera Cloud och hanterar administrativa uppgifter runt gäster och säkerhet. Allt arbete sker med gästnöjdhet och försäljning i fokus.


Hotellet har öppet dygnet runt och det är därför viktigt att du trivs med att arbeta i skift (förmiddagar, eftermiddagar och helger).


**Vem är du?**



För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.


Eftersom arbetet till stor del består av att kommunicera med gäster är goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska en förutsättning. Talar du ytterligare ett språk är det meriterande.


Allra viktigast är dock dina personliga egenskaper och din inställning. För att passa i rollen behöver du vara en lyhörd och prestigelös lagspelare som tar ett stort ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och helhetsresultatet.


**Information om tjänsten**



Tjänsten är en anställning med vikariat på deltid.


Vi tillämpar provanställning. Din närmsta chef kommer att vara vår Front Office Manager. Platsen omfattar dag- kvällsskift under vardagar och helger. Startdatum så snart som möjligt.



Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.



Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic!



Ps. på vår hemsida kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, vad tjänsten innebär och om våra förmåner!


  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------

Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.
company_addresses:
Scandic Hotels Deutschland GmbH
Gabriele-Tergit-Promenade 19
10963 Berlin

title: CRM & Marketing Automation Lead - Vikariat
description:
Vi befinner oss på en spännande transformationsresa mot framtiden, och nu söker vi en vikarie för rollen som **CRM & Marketing Automation Lead** inom vår enhet Digital & Sales Development. Tjänsten är ett föräldravikariat som pågår fram till 31 juli 2026, med start omgående eller enligt överenskommelse. Vi ser gärna att du är i början av din karriär, har lagt den teoretiska grunden inom området CRM och vill lära dig av en spännande resa.


**Om rollen**  

Som CRM & Marketing Automation Lead kommer du att fungera som en viktig länk mellan verksamheten och vår CRM-plattform (Salesforce). Du bidrar med kunskap, konsultation och stöd i det dagliga arbetet, och agerar som förlängd arm åt vår Product Manager för CRM när det gäller att samla in behov från användarna.


Du ingår i den centrala enheten Digital & Sales Development, som ansvarar för värdeströmmarna Sales & CRM för våra varumärken. Du rapporterar direkt till Head of Digital & Sales Development och samarbetar nära med Implementation Manager vid större utrullningar och förändringar.

**Dina huvudsakliga uppgifter är**

  

* Vara organisationens förespråkare för CRM och Salesforce, och sprida kunskap mellan användare
* Representera verksamhetens behov gentemot PM CRM för utveckling och förbättringar
* Arbeta med dataintegration, analyser och uppföljning
* Ta fram rapporter och insikter kring digital marknadsföring och kundresor
* Stötta användare i felsökning och problemlösning
* Utbilda och kommunicera kring förändringar i plattformen
* Vara en resurs inom Marketing Automation i Salesforce, inklusive urval och byggande av kundresor
* Delta aktivt med ansvar för delprojekt i den pågående migreringen av CRM till vår nya ägare Porsche Holding Salzburgs motsvarande system i Salesforce

**Vem är du?**  

Vi söker dig med dokumenterad erfarenhet av digital marknadsföring. Erfarenhet av Salesforce och dess moln (Sales-, Service- & Marketing Cloud) är meriterande. Du har god förståelse för Marketing Automation och kan agera bollplank till våra varumärken.


Eftersom CRM innebär hantering av kunddata och samtycken, är god kunskap om GDPR viktig. Du har dessutom en relevant universitetsutbildning inom marknadsföring, vilket är ett krav för tjänsten. Viktigt är också att du behärskar engelska, som är vårt koncernspråk, i tal och skrift.


Volkswagen Group erbjuder ett stimulerande arbete med goda möjligheter till utveckling och ett flexibelt arbetsklimat med frihet under ansvar.  

  



**Om tjänsten**  

Tjänsten är ett föräldravikariat som sträcker sig fram till 31 juli 2026, med start omgående eller enligt överenskommelse.


För dig som visar stark kompetens, engagemang och förståelse för vår verksamhet kan det även finnas möjligheter till fortsatt anställning inom koncernen efter vikariatets slut.

**Ansökan och kontakt**  

Vill du veta mer om tjänsten är du välkommen att ringa rekryterande chef *Peter Olsson, Head of Digital & Sales Development* på tel. 08 553 866 17.

**Kontaktuppgifter till fackliga representanter:**  

Annika Saarenpää Ordf. Unionen, tel: 08-553 868 89  

Kristian Jansson Ordf. Ledarna, tel: 08-588 348 31


Du är välkommen att skicka din ansökan bestående av CV. Urval och intervjuer kan komma att ske löpande.

**Sista ansökningsdag: 7 september 2025.**

*Volkswagen Group Sverige AB är ett helägt dotterbolag till Porsche Holding Salzburg, som i sin tur ägs av Europas största biltillverkare Volkswagen AG. Vi marknadsför Volkswagen Personbilar, Audi, SEAT, CUPRA,* *ŠKODA**, Porsche och Volkswagen Transportbilar – samtliga med starkt fäste på den svenska marknaden. I företagsgruppen ingår även dotterbolaget Europeisk Biluthyrning AB.*


Läs mer om oss som arbetsgivare och om vår värdegrund på vår karriärsida.
